public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

The core of the toolkit that handles the execution of the modules.

Field Summary
private  org.apache.commons.chain.Catalog catalog
          Collection of named Commands (or Chains) that can be used to retrieve the set of commands that should be performed.
private static java.lang.String CONFIG_FILE
          Location of the XML configuration file that defines and configures commands and command chains to be registered in a Catalog.
private  org.apache.commons.chain.config.ConfigParser parser
          Class to parse the contents of an XML configuration file (using Commons Digester) that defines and configures commands and command chains to be registered in a Catalog.
